name: Awesome Javascript Tooling
author: Chencheng
description: A collection of awesome browser-side JavaScript libraries, resources and shiny things.

tools.title: npm
tools.description: npm is the package manager for javascript.

tools.title: Bower
tools.description: A package manager for the web.

tools.title: component
tools.description: Client package management for building better web applications.

tools.title: spm
tools.description: Brand new static package manager.

tools.title: jam
tools.description: A package manager using a browser-focused and RequireJS compatible repository.

tools.title: jspm
tools.description: Frictionless browser package management.

tools.title: Ender
tools.description: The no-library library.

tools.title: volo
tools.description: Create front end projects from templates, add dependencies, and automate the resulting projects.

tools.title: Duo
tools.description: Next-generation package manager that blends the best ideas from Component, Browserify and Go to make organizing and writing front-end code quick and painless.

tools.title: RequireJS
tools.description: A file and module loader for JavaScript.

tools.title: SeaJS
tools.description: A Module Loader for the Web.

tools.title: HeadJS
tools.description: The only script in your HEAD.

tools.title: curl
tools.description: A small, fast, extensible module loader that handles AMD, CommonJS Modules/1.1, CSS, HTML/text, and legacy scripts.

tools.title: lazyload
tools.description: Tiny, dependency-free async JavaScript and CSS loader.

tools.title: script.js
tools.description: Asyncronous JavaScript loader and dependency manager.

tools.title: systemjs
tools.description: AMD, CJS & ES6 spec-compliant module loader.

tools.title: LodJS
tools.description: Module loader based on AMD

tools.title: ESL
tools.description: Module loader browser first, support lazy define and AMD.

tools.title: browserify
tools.description: Browserify lets you require('modules') in the browser by bundling up all of your dependencies.

tools.title: webpack
tools.description: Packs CommonJs/AMD modules for the browser.

tools.title: mocha
tools.description: Simple, flexible, fun javascript test framework for node.js & the browser.

tools.title: jasmine
tools.description: DOM-less simple JavaScript testing framework.

tools.title: qunit
tools.description: An easy-to-use JavaScript Unit Testing framework.

tools.title: jest
tools.description: Painless Javascript Unit Testing.

tools.title: prova
tools.description: Node & Browser test runner based on Tape and Browserify

tools.title: DalekJS
tools.description: Automated cross browser functional testing with JavaScript

tools.title: chai
tools.description: BDD / TDD assertion framework for node.js and the browser that can be paired with any testing framework.

tools.title: Sinon.JS
tools.description: Test spies, stubs, and mocks for JavaScript.

tools.title: expect.js
tools.description: Minimalistic BDD-style assertions for Node.JS and the browser.

tools.title: istanbul
tools.description: Yet another JS code coverage tool.

tools.title: blanket
tools.description: A simple code coverage library for javascript. Designed to be easy to install and use, for both browser and nodejs.

tools.title: JSCover
tools.description: JSCover is a tool that measures code coverage for JavaScript programs.

tools.title: phantomjs

tools.title: slimerjs
tools.description: A PhantomJS-like tool running Gecko.

tools.title: casperjs
tools.description: Navigation scripting & testing utility for PhantomJS and SlimerJS.

tools.title: zombie
tools.description: Insanely fast, full-stack, headless browser testing using node.js.

tools.title: totoro
tools.description: A simple and stable cross-browser testing tool.

tools.title: karma
tools.description: Spectacular Test Runner for JavaScript.

tools.title: nightwatch
tools.description: UI automated testing framework based on node.js and selenium webdriver.

tools.title: intern
tools.description: A next-generation code testing stack for JavaScript.

tools.title: yolpo
